Then you can avoid the wrong way to do it perfectly. That's also what we say good experience comes from practice. Practice makes perfect can also be experienced in your English study, especially in the vacabulary  and grammar studies. You can remember a word by resiting  it many times. At the beginning, you can repeat it every 2-3  hours, and then repeat it every 2-3  days. . . If you do this constantly, you'll remember the word forever. That's the right way in your grammar study. A grammar result  will be remembered after you've done several similar problems  . In our lives, "practice makes perfect" is also very good. For example, a typist can type very few word per minute at the begining  . But after he practices a long time, he can type a lot per minite  . Yes, we should remember "Practice makes perfect". It's important to us.

Dad said:  "It indicates practice makes perfect. . . ", but I didn't understand it. As I grew up, I know it. It means that you make practice, practice. . . until you can do it  well;  don't be afraid of failure, just make practice  . And one day you'll find that you are very good at it  . That means perfect. I have studied English for 6 years. During this period of time, I realized the advantagement  of "Practice makes perfect". At the beginning of my studying English, I couldn't pronounce the word well, remember the meaning of the English words, recite the whole text and so on.  I thought I must be stupid and I couldn't study English well. Just then I remembered the story Dad had told me. "Practice makes Perfect" came into my mind, and after that every morning I spent on hour reading English words and texts. Soon I studied English very well. Just then I really understood the imply  of "practice makes perfect". If you know the imply  of that letters  , I think you will be successful for ever. For example  I'm  not like sports, and my performance of running is so bad, but I know that practice makes perfect. So every morning at 6:00, I begin  running, and soon my performance of running is  improved  I succeed. I think every one will succeed if he keeps practise  and I wish everyone will remember it --practice makes perfect. It will help you in your furture  .

What is your understanding about this proverb? I think "practice" means "do it over and over  " and "perfect" means to "command it, to be good at it", then  we can say this proverb means if you do a matter  over and over you can become good at it and do it efficiently.  For example, in our study of English, we can understand this proverb very well. English is a new kind of language to us, we haven't any idea about it before, so it's difficult for us to learn it.  To learn it well, we must practise  and practise, we get up early every morning and read English loudly for about half an hour,  we try our best to speak English in English lessons  , we make use of every chance to practise oral English with foreigners.  Then we commend  the language little by little and finally we can speak English without thinking in advance. Why? because  we practise, and practice makes perfect. Not only in the study of English,  in many other aspects, the proverb proves quite right, it is the same when we learn our mother language and it is the same when we learn to draw a picture, we must practise. <ST 3> <SEX ?> <Y ?> <AGE ?> <WAY 1> <DIC 2> <TYP 1> <TITLE Health Gains In Developing Countries> 	It can be seen from the above pic  that two obvious changes took place in health gains in developing countries betwen  1960 to 1990. One is the life expectancy extended from 40 years old to 60 years old:   the other is the infant mortaility  decreased by half  ,  that is from 200 per 1,000 to 100 per 1,000. 	Then, what causes brought about the two changes? 	During these 30 years from 1960 to 1990 the whole world got a spurt. Most developing countries got independent. So they hold their own fates in their own hand  . Fights  broke out less  and,  so people can contribute  to develop their industry and agriculture. Those resources can be seen  almost everywhere. However  in fact  , fresh water is in a critic  shortage, nowadays. With the dramatically  increasing of population and the amount of industry using water, more fresh water is used everyday. And pullotion  of the water have reduced the water available  greatly. Hence something must be done to avoid the future disasters  that the shortage of fresh water would bring to us. Every individual must use water facianally  . And laws must be passed to oblidge  the factories from wasting and polluting water. Only in this way can our situations be improved. 

<ST 3> <SEX ?> <Y ?> <WAY 1> <TYP 1> <SCH 2841> <DIC ?> <TITLE Global shortage of Fresh Water> <SCORE 13> <ID 447830> Nowadays people usually think that fresh water in  the earth will be plentiful for ever. Many people argue that there are so many rivers and wells in the world that human beings may have a  plenty of fresh water to use. Moreover, it rains a lot in a year. So it makes up for the used fresh water. But in fact, the problem of fresh water shortage is becoming more and more serious today. There are many reasons for the problem. Firstly, overpopullation  has caused the fact that there are more and more people who will need much fresh water year by year. Secondly, the need of fresh water in industry is increasing. Thirdly, pollutions  have caused  that a lot of fresh water can't be used by human beings. In a word, our world is facing the problem of water shortage. Many measures should be taken to solve this problem. We can turn sea water into fresh water by scientific means. And we should use water economically in our everyday lives.

<ST 3> <SEX ?> <Y ?> <AGE ?> <DIC ?> <TYP 1> <WAY 1> <SCH 2841> <TITLE Global Shortage of Fresh Water> <SCORE 10> <ID 448017> People always think that fresh water will never be used up. Because there are many sources of water, such as the rain, river  , the water of underground. . . These sources of water offer us a  plenty of fresh water. In fact, fresh water is in the  serious shortage. The increase of population has caused the greater and greater consumption of water. Because of the development of the industry, more and more fresh water is being used. And many factories have seriously polluted the fresh water, therefore, a great deal of fresh water becomes wasted.  There are many instances that can proved the fact. So what should we do? I think we should establish some systems to control the using  water of industry. We should control the rapid promotion  of population. The water pollution is getting worse and worse. The shortage of fresh water is getting more and more serious. Facing the important problem, what should we do? We must have a  experience of water-cut  . So we must save every drop of water. I think the government should build some plants that do  with the dirty water and should make some laws  reduce the water pollution. On the other hand, we can plant many trees to clean the water that is polluted.

More seriously, the consequence of the industry improvement is the pollution of water. So it's no wonder that many scientists appeal  that we should protect the global water resource early. In addition to  , we should call on the others to do so. We believe we can make  the earth to be a heaven as long as each of us can protect the water!

<ST 3> <SEX ?> <Y ?> <WAY 1> <TYP 1> <DIC ?> <SCH 2303> <TITLE Global Shortage of Fresh Water> <SCORE 13> <ID 4405525> People take it for granted that water resources will never be used up. There are many water sources where we can fetch water, such as rain, rivers and wells and so on. In fact, we are very short of water. To begin with, because of the rapidly  increase of population, more and more water is wanted for people to use in daily  . In addition, with the development of industry, a large number of factories call for more and more water than ever. Finally, water pollution is a very serious problem, which is caused by various wastes flowing into water. What can we do to solve the problem? On the one hand, we must take actions to cut down the excessive demands for water by controlling the overpopulation. On the other hand, we must effectively prevent the water from being polluted and wasted. For example, we can put more laws about the protection of water into effect. What is more, it is high time that we realized the importance and serious shortage of water.

To solve the problem, we must save the fresh water and reduce the polution  . Now scientists are studying  a way to gain fresh water from the sea. If it comes true, the problem of the fresh water will be solved.

But Mother is always strict with us. She never neglects our mistakes. It is mother who gives me a careful character. We all respect her in return. Further  is fourty  -seven-year old. In those days, he did all he could to support us to go to school. Nowdays  .  my brother and I have gone to college. My little sister has gone to the  primary school. But Further  doesn't stop working. He always says: "I can work now. " I always tries  to persuate  him to do little work. Father does give me a strong character. Now, my brother is studying in Nan Yang Normal University. And I studies  in He Nan Normal University. Mother and Farther are very proud of us. Do you think my family is very happy?

When we are in dark  , the fire will show us a direction to go ahead, and at the sight of flaring fire, we are stimulated to  courage and passion. But fire can also be very harmful. If one is careless.  the fire will break out, it can do harmful  to people.  animal and our circumstance,  it can make the house, wood, forest burning  ,  if it happens, we will have a large damage  ,  and it  is so easy to break out that we have difficult  in controlling it when it happens. Anything has its advantage and disadvantage. So has the fire. We should create many conditions to cause the fire to apply  to its advantage, and try our best to avoid it  disadvantage. When we can handle carefully  with  it, we can get much  advantage  as possible as we can.

On the left side  wall,  between the two bunks, a large bright mirror has been fixed for us to look at ourselves everyday. At the side of the mirror, there is a basin stand, shining with blue paintings  . Such is my bedroom. Although a little small and crowded,  it is comfortable and full of love. We all takes  it as our warm home.

In a word, sometimes you must encounter failure in one way or another. People have different attitude towards failure. Some one may become disappointment  and discouraged. They may lose  their hearts to continue working with efforts. Some even want to suicide once they have a big failure  . On the contrary, for some others, failure can only make them more encourageous  and confidence  . I think the latter is the proper attitude toward failure. At  the face of failure, we should think over and draw the  lessons from it so that we will be able to go forward with experience and become successful at last.

By chance, I knew her telephone number from a man who also came from Shang. I phoned her at once, she told me she had written many letter  to me but received nothing. During the call, we both cried, for the XXX  friendship,  for the engith  years' wait!

<ST 3> <SEX 1> <Y 8> <AGE 21> <DIC 1> <TYP 1> <WAY 3> <Title Human Needs> <Score 10> What are the basic human needs? When we speak of a basic human need, we mean something which is necessary to life,  something we cannot possibly do without. Food is a basic human being  need. Just as oil to a car,  so is food to life. Without it we would starve to death. Then comes clothing. Clothing is necessary to control  the heat of our bodies. Since we live in a temperate climate  we need more clothes than people living in tropical countries, but less than people living in arctic conditions  . Shelter, the third of our needs, depends upon the climate, the skill of the builder, one's social position, and the materials available. The simple shelter of the aboriginal would not do for us, and yet it satisfies his needs. The modern house contains many of material comforts which were denied to the kings and queens of old time.

<ST 3> <SEX 1> <Y 8> <AGE 20> <DIC 2> <TYP 1> <WAY 3> <Title My Plan for Studying English> <Score 10> It's well known to us that English is becoming more and more important. I'm a college student, and I'm going to face work  in the future. Of course, I must improve my Engling  level  . After my thinking for a long time, I decide to plan the following plan  so that I can become a top student. First:  In  the morning, from 6:30 to 7:00 I must read the new text for 3 times, and when I reading the text  I must with a loud voice  . Second:  At  noon, from 12:00 to 12:30.  I must go over the notes which the teacher taught in the classes and I must review the new words for two times  . Third:  In  the evening, from 9:30 - 10:20 I must finish the assignment at first. If there is no assignment in that day I should talk about the texts and notes with other students.  so that I can have a deeply effect  . Forth:  In  the Saturday evening I should listen to the BBC or the voice of USA  on the radio  . Fifth:  When  I learn 3 texts, I must go over them togther  and find out the important points. Sixth:  In  order to improve my English level  , I must do all the points which I write above. I think I can become a top student if I do as I planed. 

<ST 3> <SEX 1> <Y 8> <AGE 20> <DIC 2> <TYP 1> <WAY 3> <Title What a Pony> <Score 10> Christmas was coming. Lennie Steffens, my son, who wanted a pony very much.  Just the day before Christmas, we were round the corner when I asked what he wanted for his present! But my son declared that he wanted nothing but a pony which would be regarded as a Christmas present for him. On Christmas Eve he hung up his stocking along with his sisters  . In the next morning he woke up at six. He was so hurt that he burst into tears when he saw his empty stocking. After a while, Steffense went out with carying  , and after an hour or two, he caught sight of a man riding a pony down the street. All that meaned  the man was just the man who brought a pony to my son.  But the man didn't stop when he passed  my house. In fact, only I knew he was the right man.  who brought the pony. Steffense was so happy and thrilled when the man came back and asked who was lennie Seffense. at  last.  Certainly my son got the pony, and I had planned it so carefully. I believed that that thing would have an deep effect on my son's mind.

To sum all  , it is important and necessary for a college student to master effective writing  . Because it  will help us succeed.

<ST 3> <SEX ?> <Y 8> <AGE 20> <DIC ?> <TYP 1> <WAY 3> <Title The Water Cycle> <Score 10> Water can change from one form to another. They  can become ice when temperature  less than 0 degree and become steam when temperature  higher than 100 degree. For example.  the heat of the sun,  can let the water evaporate from the river, the lake, the plant, and so on. The water will become the clouds and rise into the sky. As the clouds rise into the sky.  they are cooled. The steam will condense, become tiny drops,  the higher they rised  the more cooled they are.  When the tiny drops become so large that the clouds can't take them, they'll fall on the earth - this is rain. Some rain water  fall  on the earth is again evaporated. Others enter the river, the sea, the lake, and the plants. this  is the water cycle.

<ST 3> <SEX ?> <Y 7> <AGE 20> <DIC ?> <TYP 1> <WAY 3> <Title The Disadventages of Cars> <Score 10> With the increasing number of cars, the problem of man's survival has to do with his control of man-made hazards which cars have created  . It has been generally accepted that cars pollute the air and congest cities. It is cars, not factories that are responsible for most of the smog in cities, and the smog threatens people's health because it presents the possibility of lung cancer. Besides  polluting the air and congesting cities, cars are involved in traffic accidents. All over the world thousands up thousands of people are killed or injured every year. Moreover, cars can contribute to heart disease, as people seem so wedded to their cars that they do not like to walk anywhere anymore. In view of the above mentioned drawbacks of cars, the use of cars should be well controlled. We ought to find a safer means of transport which will bring joy and comfort rather than injury and death.

<ST 3> <SEX 1> <Y 8> <SCH ZZDX> <AGE 20> <WAY 3> <DIC 2> <TYP 1> <SCORE > <TITLE The value of time > Nobody knows what time is like, for we can't see it, nor can we touch it, which we can only imagine in our mind. But we do know that time passes very quickly,  Some students, however, do not know how to make the best use of it, for they wasts  it in going to films, playing games and doing other useless things,  why  do we go to school early in the morning? why do trains run so fast? why do most people prefer taking buses insteed  of walking? The answer is very simple: we wish to save time because time is precious. Today we are living in the twentieth century. we  know that time is life, when a person dies, his time has ended.  Since life is short, we must devote our time and energy to our studies so that we may be able to serve out country and the people. But since time is invisible, we often neglect it  Laziness is the thief of time, for Laziness not only brings us a lot of harm, it also brings us failure. If it is necessary for us to do some work today, Let us do it today and not leave it untill  tomorrow. Remember that time is more valuable than money.

<ST 3> <SEX 2> <Y 8> <SCH ZZDX> <AGE 20> <WAY 3> <DIC ?> <TYP 1> <SCORE 12> <TITL Competition and Cooperation> Comperation  is a common phenomenon in our social life. It is human's nature that if one person is good, others will want to be better than him. So between two students, between two athletes, or between two counties, competition exests  . And in every realm, competition works. It promotes the students to study more, the high-jumping athletes to jump higher, and the countries to develop faster. Though there must be someone to be defeated in competition, it is a benefitial  thing on the whole. Cooperatition is one the  contrary to competition, but we often find competition and cooperation at the same time ( A lot of things in the world are complex like this. ) competition  means defeating others but cooperation means helping others and accepting others' help. One point is the same: our aim is to do better. Sometimes, we can't do such a thing by ourselves, such as in playing football or basketball then we need cooperation. Then while we are advacating  competition, we can't forget cooperation. After all, one person's ability is limited, and frequently, we should depend on the collective power. Besides, we all have some shortcomings. Though  cooperation, we can learn from our cooperator and correct our shortcomings. In fact, to cooperate is to compete more effectively.

<ST 3> <SEX 1> <Y 8> <SCH ZZDX> <AGE 21> <WAY 3> <DIC 1> <TYP 1> <SCORE 9> <TITL Basketball> Basketball is one  sport whose exact origin can safely  be stated. In the spring of 1898,Dr. James Naismith, a college instructer  invented the game of basketball in order to provide exercise  for the students between the closing of the football season and the opening of the baseball season. He attached  fruit baskets overhead in the walls, and,  using  a soccer ball  .  Organized nine man teams  to play his new game in which the purpose was to throw the ball into basket and try to keep the opposing  team from throwing the ball into it  . Although there have since  been many changes in the rules (such as cutting down the number of players on  a team from nine to five),the game is basically the same  today. The United States soldiers  introduced it to the Philippines and to Europe, and,  being adopted by foreign nations it soon became a world--wide sport.  It is intereting  that although basketball was areated  as an indoor game, in countries other than the United States it is now played almost entirely outdoors.

After reading those letters I can feel the wo- rld aroud me is full of love and sunney  . But, waiting for letters is much worried  . The only reason is that you don't receive the letter that you should do  . It's obvious  different bethveen  the three,First. <ST 3> <SEX 2> <Y 7> <AGE 19> <DIC Y> <TYP 1> <WAY 3> <Title ON BEAUTY> <SCORE 12>  It is human nature  to love beautiful things. Handsome men and pretty wemen  were  popular with us as well as the  beautiful rivers, mountains, plants and flowers. We feel happy about all of  beautiful things. Yet men and women differ in their views as to what is beautiful. The old saying says that men are fond of good looks in women, while women adore talents. Some ladies use make-up in order to look pretty herself  and be more attactive  . Men strain themselves to be high achievers and as a result win the admiration from men and wemen. However, beauty is only skin deep. Inner beauty is worth  more than appearance. A good-looking man does not necessarily have a gold  heart. On the contrary, an ugly man may win respect by his shinning  deeds. Generally  , appearance is misleading. So don't judge by appearance.

<ST 3> <SEX 2> <Y 8> <AGE 19> <DIC Y> <TYP 1> <WAY 2> <Title CHANGES OF THE SEASONS> <SCORE 13>  The earth circle  round the sun, which results in four seasons: spring, summer, autumn and winter. Spring is the beginning of a year. The weather become  warmer and warmer. Ice and snow begin to melt, plants begin to come up  . Everything is full of vitality. Then comes summer. Summer is the hottest season of a year. Because of the strong  heat, people have to dress in light clothes. And swimming become a favorite activities  for many people. > Summer is also the most beautiful season for the coloful  flowers. Autumn is the golden season. Leaves turn in  orange yellow, crops grow up, fruits are also in their harvest season. Weather is cool and dry. Autumn is the best season of all. Winter is the coldest season of a year. The wind is blowing hard. Sometimes  when it snows, there is a white-world of ice and snow. To protect themselves from the cold weaher, people wear heavy  clothes.

I thought their minds excited as mine  . The bus set off at 30 past 11. For I had bussick  as soon as the bus started. I fell asleep in the seat. I didn't know how long had passed. Some  noises woke me  . I opened my eyes and looked out of the window. I saw a man about forty years old lying in the middle of the road. A motor lying beside him. His head was blooding. My heart beated quickly. At that moment I looked around me. I hoped the bus to stop very much  . And there was people getting off to save him  . However, to my disappointment.  Not only nobody reached  a hand to him but also they all made fun of him. I wanted  help him, but I finally  didn't do so  . Because I was afraid that  they would leave me alone. I was even afraid of their making fun of me. Now when I can't help thinking  the thing, I hate my hesitation and weakness.

" One of the students said. Secondly, they find they are living in a competitive society. They are free to choose the company, but it more competing and risks being unemployed.  Thus, competition  in univercity  are  much more intense than it is  decades ago. Colledge students are studying harder to get high records  instead of passing the examination only. New products arised  constantly. They have covered all the lines  : industry, agriculture, business, life, production and so on. Computer  is  very expensive to a person  before. Only the company that really need   bought it. After the personal computer's appearing  , computer  have entered the ordinary family  more and more people who were interested in computers began to buy them  . Computer  is in a period of network. As long as a family own  a computer, they can trip  all  the world by computer  . Computer  is confronting the new challenge. 

<ST 3> <SEX 1> <Y 7> <AGE 20> <DIC 2> <TYP 1> <WAY 3> <Title HOW TO MAKE A GOOD IMPRESSION AT A JOB INTERVIEW> <SCORE 10>   When we grow up, we need to have a job to do, so as to make our living  . Especially, as far as  us  students at university  , we have to confront with  a  interview for a good job when we graduate. But, have you thought about how to make a successful interview? A successful interview means you can make a good impression at  the interview  and you'll be accepted. Usually, the interviewer want to learn about many things about you,whether it is important or not. So you'd better make a full  preparation before you go to attend  a  interview. At least  , you should put on a neat and order  suit  , and bumb  your hair smooth. You  dress make  you feel comfortable. Then your appearance will make a good first impression on the interviewer. As a  interviewee, you maybe  afraid to talk with the interviewer. So you must to  do your best to overcom your fearness  , to face  plainly and couragely  . If you make a date  with the interviewer firstly, you must go to meet him on time.  In the corse  of the interview, you'll be asked many questions, you'd better answer them in detail. Somtimes  , he may ask you some strange questions to test your speed of reflection. To these questions, you answer  them carefully. What  the most important is that you should show interest in soemthing  you excel at and show your virtue  as possible as  you can. According to these suggestions, you'll success  in a half  . Good luck to you!

So, mutual understanding is the base of  teacher-student relationship.

However, when he recognized that it was Tom's father, he hit back hard. Peter fell down to the ground before he was wondering  what the expression of Jack was.  Peter walked home defeated. <ST 3> <SEX 1> <Y 7> <AGE ?> <DIC ?> <TYP 1> <WAY 3> <TITLE BICYCLES IN CHINA> <SCORE 10>     The bicycle is the most popular means of transportation in China. People go to work by bicycle, students go to school by bicycle, and so on. Today, China has the largest numbers of bicycle  in the world.  Compared with cars  , the bicycle has several advantages. For one thing, bicycle  is cheaper than cars  . Most people can afford to buy a bicycle. For another, bicycle  is easily to protect  . We can lay it at home, but cars can not  . At last, bicycle  is easy to learn how to run  . Of course, there are other advantages of bicycle  .  However, the popularity of bicycles have  something to do with the condition of China. As we all known  , China is a developing country, still very poor. Most Chinese spend more money on the necessities of life except for  low-priced consumer  goods. So bicycles are good enough for all  personal travel.

Good health means a lot to us all. So in order to keep fit, we must do physical exercises. If we usually do it  , our health will get better and better. We also go to a walk and breath fresh air after working or studying.

<ST 3> <SEX 2> <Y 8> <AGE ?> <DIC N> <TYP 2> <WAY 2> <TITLE A BLACK EYE OR TWO> <SCORE 7>    One Sunday afternoon I was reading the newspaper when Tom, my little son of six years, rushed into the room crying bitterly.  'what's the matter. Schatz?' I asked eagerly.  Tom came up to me and pointed outside, 'It's John, he hitted  me!'  'What? ' And I found my boy's left eye was black and bruised. I couldn't hold back my anger. In a rage, I rushed out to John's home.  In a few minutes, I arrived. Hearing a louder cry, I found John's father approached  to me. Suddenly, without a word he smashed his fist into my eye and I knocked  down to the ground heavily.  When I managed to stand on my foot, he cried to me, 'If your kid bother  my boy again, I'll. . . ' He shaved  his fists and went back home.  I walked slowly and defeated to my home. After a daytime, my eyes got black samely. I was upset and depressed. What on earth we had do! 

<ST 3> <SEX 1> <Y 7> <AGE ?> <DIC N> <TYP 2> <WAY 2> <TITLE A BLACK EYE OR TWO> <SCORE 7>     One Sunday afternoon Peter was reading the newspaper when Tom, his little son of six years, rushed into the room crying bitterly. Tom said that Jack, the neighbour's child had hit him, so that his left eye was black and bruised. Tom pointed outdoors with his finger, Jack was still playing in the street. In a rage, Peter jumped out of the armchair and rushed out to look for Jack. Jack did not notice that, he seemed still enjoying himself. This caused Peter become angerer  , he smashed his fist into Jack's chest, Jack was knocked down to the ground. The child did not cry, he stood up again, hit  Peter's eye back hard, then run  away. As a result Peter got a black eye, too. He though that Jack had the special ability, he walked home defeatedly  , and looked upset and depressed.

<ST 3> <SEX 1> <Y 7. 5> <AGE ?> <DIC N> <TYP 1> <WAY 3> <TITLE THE IMPORTANCE OF THE REFORM AND OPEN POLICY> <SCORE 7> <SCH HENAN MEDICAL UNIVERSITY>    In 1978, the Communist Party carried out the reform and open policy in order to envelop  Chinese economicy  . It is a neccesy  way to Chinese evelopment  .  It has been 19 years since the reform and open policy was carry out. China has made  a great change; industry  ,  took on a new look,  economicy  has become several times  than before. The reform and open policy gave China energy.  In the future, with the reform and open policy. China will be one of enveloped  countries. It make  the whole people rich. The brilliant life is waiting for us. The country will be more pros  . 

<ST 3> <SEX 2> <Y 8. 5> <AGE ?> <DIC ?> <TYP 1> <WAY 3> <TITLE THE IMPORTANCE OF THE REFORM AND OPEN POLICY> <SCORE 8>     The Reform and Open Policy is very necessary to China. The old plan-economicy  policy isn't fit for China and more. It held back the development of Chinese economicy  . And the Reform and Open Policy is fit for our country.  In recent years we have made a rapid progress. In agriculture our amount  of crop was always as double as last year  . Since 1978 our industry has set up  more and more. For example, the amount  of our cars is increasing. In science many new technologies have been used in daily life, such as all kinds for  medicine of cancer.
